title: Mandator Line
summary: The Mandator Line, designed by the Kavani Mandate, focuses on module customization and energy, with adequate speed and health. Warships in this line are hull-based and tend to have top-heavy turret placement. Ships in this line are also faster and more agile than their Foralkan and Lycentian counterparts.
full_text:
Mandator Line
The Mandator Line, designed by the Kavani Mandate, focuses on module customization and energy, with adequate speed and health. Warships in this line are hull-based and tend to have top-heavy turret placement. Ships in this line are also faster and more agile than their Foralkan and Lycentian counterparts.
Ship names are inspired by things referencing politics, although the starfighters are named after tropical birds.
Interceptor
Fighter
Corvette
Frigate
Destroyer
Cruiser
Battleship
T1
Parrot
Toucan
Edict
Judicator
Conciliator
Subjugator*
Conqueror**
T2
Macaw
Hornbill
Exotic
*The Subjugator is only used by Kavani NPCs, and is labeled ingame as Kavani Cruiser, Kavani Veteran Cruiser, Kavani Ace Cruiser, or Kavani Sovereign Cruiser.
**The Conqueror is only used by NPCs, and is labeled ingame as Kavani Sovereign Battleship.
